name: Meteor Storm
overview: Meteor Storm is a 1-player arcade game for multiple systems. The player controls a small spaceship that moves laterally, and can fire vertically downwards. The player can shoot and destroy incoming meteors, and gains 100 points for each meteor destroyed, and points for time survived. The player can also enter hyperspace to warp to a different part of the screen, but risks appearing within an asteroid. The game becomes more difficult for every 1000 points scored.
